name: Scroll of the dice
description:
WASD to move, SPACE to attack, SHIFT to roll

this game was made for the GMTK gamejam of 2022. Due to some unfortunate circumstances I could only work on the game for the first day and can't participate in the rest of the jam. Some sounds are missing and some features are slightly unpolished, bummer.

I hope you still enjoy the game anyways and see what kind of concept I was leading towards.

Please leave a comment, that would make my day!
